text: Hongfu Road Station is a metro station in Dongguan, China. It opened on 27 May 2016. == Station Platform == {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=110 rowspan=10 valign=top|Ground level |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 rowspan=2 valign=top| |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=390 rowspan=2 valign=top|Entrance |} {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;border-top:solid 0px gray;" width=110 valign=top|(B1) |style="border-top:solid 0px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|Hall |style="border-top:solid 0px gray;border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=390 valign=top|Vending machine, Customer service |- |style="border-top:solid 0px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=110 rowspan=3 valign=top|(B2) |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=100|' |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=450|← Line 2 toward Dongguan railway station (Qifeng Park) |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;text- align:center;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors will open on the left |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100|' |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=390|→ Line 2 toward Humen railway station (Xiping) → |} ==References== Category:Dongguan Rail Transit stations Category:Railway stations in China opened in 2016
title: Hongfu Road station
